name: FNaF: Running in the 80's - FNaF Fan-Game

description:
~ official discord server -> right here fam <- ~
---
WARNING: As it stands right now, Windows Defender sometimes recognizes the game as a virus. The game isn't a virus, we think it sets off antivirus softwares because the game creates a custom save folder. Please know that the game is completely safe, if you're having problems playing it set the software to ignore it.

----

"Love food? Love fun? Then you'll LOVE FredBear's Family Diner! Our cast of colorful fun animatronic animals will surely keep you smiling the whole way through! A wide, clean, wondrous facility welcomes you to get as messy and as playful as you'd like! So what're you waiting for? There's plenty of time to waste here at FredBear's Family Diner! So come on down, or if you'd like to make a delivery, please call (801) - 555 - 8924! There's tons of fun waiting for you at FredBear's Family Diner, so while the sun's shining, get to it!"

...but the sun won't be shining for you, will it?

----

Q: What is this game?

A: This game is a fan take on a hypothetical Five Nights at Freddy's 5. It only takes the first four games into account, and is only meant to be a simple yet memorable fnaf experience.

Q: What exactly am I supposed to do?

A: Running in the 80's is a "Learn it yourself" type game. It doesn't just outright give you info on how to beat it, it's all about trial and error.
